title: Nintendo Direct Mini Outta Nowhere! - Kinda Funny Funny Games Daily 03.26.20
description:
MinnMax's Ben Hanson joins Greg to talk about today's surprise Nintendo Direct Mini, Epic publishing games from a bunch of devs you love, and more! Support MinnMax at http://www.patreon.com/minnmax!

Time Stamps - 
00:06:20 - Housekeeping
We’re streaming Animal Crossing this afternoon! At 2 p.m., come see my island, Joey’s island, and whatever Andy and Blessing have been up to. It’ll be on YouTube.com/kindafunnygames later.
Mohammed Mohammed, Justin Toft, Das Bear Jew, Black Jack, Jarrett Brown
The Roper Report   -
00:10:00 - Nintendo Direct Mini
00:33:10 - What can people do to set their expectations at the correct level for Nintendo Directs, and other gaming events? - Best Friends Q: ArkWing
00:36:40 - Epic Games Partners with Remedy, Playdead, and Design
00:47:12 - Fallout 76 Wastelanders DLC Delayed
00:52:40 -  QUIP
00:53:55 -  ExpressVPN
00:55:35 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:49:50 - At this point, does Naughty Dog & Playstation look to intentionally delay The Last of Us II to a later date of when society is in a better state, so that the game would be more welcomed? - Branddnh
01:01:50 - The Division 2 because it's too close to reality right now. As somebody who's had the exact opposite reaction, who's been playing games like The Division 2 and reading every article remotely related to COVID-19 because it's so close to reality, I wanted your takes. How do you react to our modern day situation? Hide away in a fantasy world to escape?  - Gondors Condor
01:06:02 - Squad Up: Luuc from the Netherlands(Pokémon GO) - 9743 5822 0485
01:07:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Blessing
